title: News24.com | Coronavirus: Our sister was harassed by neighbours after testing positive, says JHB family
description: A Johannesburg woman is allegedly harassed and victimised after voluntarily disclosing her Covid-19 infection to her neighbourhood.
content:
A Sandhurst, Johannesburg, woman who voluntarily disclosed her Covid-19 infection to her neighbourhood has been subjected to harassment, stigmatisation and victimisation, her family claimed in a statement posted on social media.
